description:
Flint`s Infernape was first seen when Ash was captured by the autodefence hands of the Sunyshore Gym. Flint sent out his Infernape to rescue Ash.
After Flint friend and rival Volkner, leader of the Sunyshore Gym wasn`t willing to participate in a battle for a gym badge with Ash, Flint agreed to battle Ash hoping it would motivate Volkner again. Flint`s Infernape defeated Ash`s Pok√©mon in a battle at the Sunyshore Gym which featured Ash`s Infernape, Buizel and Pikachu.
name: Goukazaru (Ooba)
